channel.title: AMS Council Agenda Feed
channel.description: A feed that parses the agendas for AMS Council

item.title: AMS Council Agenda – November 5, 2025 at 6:00 PM
item.guid: AMS Council Agenda – November 5, 2025 at 6:00 PM
item.content:encoded:
AMS Council Meeting

Alma Mater Society of UBC Vancouver

Wednesday, November 5, 2025 at 6:00 PM PST to Wednesday, November 5, 2025 at

10:00 PM PST

Michael Kingsmill Forum + Zoom for Councillors (must be pre-arranged with the President)

Meeting Details: https://ubc.zoom.us/j/68210956540?pwd=HHfR2o0zlbVx5sfbVqSwAOAla1imXE.1

Meeting ID: 682 1095 6540

Passcode: 772617

Additional Meeting Details: Join Zoom Meeting: https://ubc.zoom.us/j/68210956540?pwd=HHfR2o0zlbVx5sfbVqSwAOAla1imXE.1

Meeting ID: 682 1095 6540

Passcode: 772617

One tap mobile:

+17789072071,,68210956540#,,,,,,0#,,772617#

Dial by your location:

+1 204 272 7920 (Vancouver)

+1 587 328 1099 (Montreal)

+1 613 209 3054 (Alberta)

+1 647 374 4685 (Ottawa)

+1 778 907 2071 (Toronto)

+1 438 809 7799 (Manitoba)

Meeting ID: 682 109

Agenda

I. Call to Order 6:00 PM

Councillors: Please complete the ongoing COI disclosure survey (linked and visible under Actions in OnBoard) prior to participating in the meeting.

Meeting will be called to order by 6:10 PM at the latest.

II. Territorial Acknowledgement 6:10 PM

III. Approval of the Agenda

"BE IT RESOLVED THAT the agenda be adopted as presented."

A. Agenda Amendment

BE IT RESOLVED THAT the agenda be amended as presented.

Amendment:

• Fee Waiver Changes

IV. Membership and Attendance: Introductions, New Members, Declaration of Vacancies

A. New Members

Tierney Schutz (Affiliates)

B. Vacancies

GSS (1)

C. Goodbyes

V. Speaker's Business and Remarks 6:12 PM

Presenter: Josh Bradbury

VI. Statements from Students-at-Large 6:15 PM

Statement from student-at-large - 3 minutes

Response from Councillors - 3 minutes

Closing remarks from student-at-large - 1 minute

Note: Up to three students at large may address Council.

VII. Approval of Minutes of Council and Committees 6:25 PM

Proposed motion:

Note: Requires 2/3rds

Proposed motion:

BE IT RESOLVED THAT the following minutes be accepted as presented:

AMS Council minutes dated July 2, 2025

AMS Council minutes dated July 23, 2025

External Briefs and Communications Committee minutes dated September 15, 2025

Building Operations Committee minutes dated September 29, 2025

EPA Committee minutes dated October 1, 2025

Finance Committee minutes dated October 17, 2025

Clubs & Societies Committee minutes dated October 17, 2025

In camera minutes:

EPA Council minutes dated July 23, 2025

Council minutes dated July 23, 2025

To view in camera minutes, contact Sheldon (archives@ams.ubc.ca)

VIII. Consent Items

IX. Presentations and Accompanying Motions

A. Sustainability Priorities Update 6:28 PM

From the Vice President Administration

Presentation period: 15 minutes

Question period: 3 minutes

B. UBC Campus + Community: Campus Vision 2050 Update 6:46 PM

Presenters: Joanne Proft, Madeleine Zammar

Presentation period: 10 minutes

Question period: 10 minutes

1. 2025 Annual General Meeting Results 7:06 PM

Presenter: Riley Huntley

From the President

Presentation period: 3 minutes

Question period: 3 minutes

X. Executive and Committee Motions

A. Code Changes 2025: Council Vice-Chair

From the Governance Committee

"BE IT RESOLVED THAT Council adopt the report from the Governance Committee entitled 'Code Changes 2025: Council Vice-Chair' and thus amend the Code as recommended."

Note: Requires 2/3rds

B. Code Changes 2025: Fee Waivers [Amendment] 7:12 PM

Presenters: Riley Huntley, Gagan Parmar

From the President and Finance Committee

Proposed motion:

"BE IT RESOLVED THAT Council adopt the report from the Finance Committee entitled 'Code Changes 2025: Fee Waivers' and thus amend the Code as recommended."

Note: Requires 2/3rds

Note: This Code amendment has been developed in consultation with the Governance

Committee Chair and will be considered by Governance Committee prior to Council meeting.

C. Executive Goals: Proposed Amendments 7:22 PM

From the President

Proposed motion:

"BE IT RESOLVED THAT Council adopt amendments to the Executive Goals as presented."

Note: Requires 2/3rds

Note: Finalized document from Marcom will be attached before the public agenda

XI. Constituency and Affiliate Motions

XII. Discussions and Consultation

XIII. President's Business and Remarks 7:32 PM

Presenter: Riley Huntley

Updates - 5 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

XIV. Executive Business and Remarks

A. VP Academic & University Affairs 7:38 PM

Presenter: Zarifa Nawar

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

B. VP Administration 7:42 PM

Presenter: Dylan Evans (he/him/his)

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

C. VP External Affairs 7:46 PM

Presenter: Solomon Yi-Kieran

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

D. VP Finance 7:50 PM

Presenter: Gagan Parmar

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

E. VP Student Life 7:54 PM

Presenter: Kevin Heieis

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

F. Managing Director 7:58 PM

Presenter: Justin Lieu

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

G. Senior Manager of Student Services 8:02 PM

Presenter: Kathleen Simpson

Question period - maximum 3 questions

XV. Committee Reports

A. Building Operations Committee 8:03 PM

Presenter: Dylan Evans (he/him/his)

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

B. Clubs and Societies Committee 8:06 PM

Presenter: Dylan Evans (he/him/his)

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

C. Events Committee 8:09 PM

Presenter: Sara Ye

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

D. External Briefs and Communications Committee 8:12 PM

Presenter: Solomon Yi-Kieran

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

E. Finance Committee 8:15 PM

Presenter: Gagan Parmar

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

F. Governance Committee 8:18 PM

Presenter: Jasper Lorien

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

G. Human Resources Committee 8:21 PM

Presenter: Jasper Lorien

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

H. Executive Performance and Accountability Committee (EPA) 8:24 PM

Presenter: Jasper Lorien

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

XVI. Report from Presidents' Council 8:27 PM

Presenter: Riley Huntley

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

XVII. Board of Governors, Senate, & Ombudsperson Reports

A. Board of Governors 8:30 PM

Presenters: Cade Desjarlais, Jasper Lorien

B. Senate 8:33 PM

Presenters: Zarifa Nawar, Dylan Evans (he/him/his)

C. Ombudsperson

Presenter: Noah Mossey

XVIII. Historical Update 8:36 PM

Presenter: Sheldon Goldfarb

XIX. Other Business, Including In Camera Discussions, Notices of Motions and Submissions

From the Vice President Administration

• Clubs Fair 2025 Report

A. In Camera Session

XX. Next Meeting and Adjournment

Next Council meeting time and date: 6:00 pm on Nov 19, 2025.

Supporting Documents
